metadata.title: CVE-2023-4008 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.9 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before16.1.3, all versions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. It was possible totakeover GitLab Pages with unique domain URLs if the random string addedwas known.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
